issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw: I was able to make a Debug compilation pass the UNIT_gz_TEST and not display that message after patching the local boost header using [the patch in the boost issue tracker](https://svn.boost.org/trac/boost/changeset/85738). Could someone please give it a try and confirm this? If so, I will send the ubuntu the proper patches to speed up the process.
